name: css-mastermind
title: CSS Mastermind
description:
[Mastermind](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mastermind_(board_game)) is a challenging code-breaking game. There are 6 colors and a 4-length code to decypher. Can you break the code?

This Mastermind game was developed using CSS and HTML (no JavaScript), and it has 4 different codes to guess.

---

Thanks to [@racascou](https://twitter.com/racascou) for the design suggestions and [@Fionna](https://codepen.io/fionnachan) for a great confetti effect (that I shamelessly modified a little, sorry.)
